Work With Me

If you’ve come via Substack, podcasts, or video, you already know the tone of my work.

This site is where it becomes operational: clarity, leverage, and movement in real situations — without theatre.

Different situations require different levels of involvement. Choose the depth of influence that matches what you are facing.

EtherBlast MegaBlast GigaBlast
Focus One key pressure point Several linked factors Entire situation pattern
Best For A single blockage or decision Interconnected problems Major life or career turning points
Scope Precision adjustment Coordinated multi-point shift Full-field realignment
Intentions One clear outcome Up to three related outcomes Broad situation influence
Engagement Depth Focused working Deeper layered working Extended full-field operation
Outcome Style Targeted movement Momentum across areas Shift in overall trajectory
Report Included ✔ ✔ ✔ (more detailed)
Investment $375 $667 $1,200
Choose EtherBlast → Choose MegaBlast → Choose GigaBlast →

If you are unsure which level fits your situation, use the contact page and describe what is happening. I will advise on the most appropriate approach.
